footerLegalRequirements: Unique room s.r.o., spisová značka: C 63667 vedená u Krajského soudu v Ostravě, IČ 04452119, sídlo společnosti: Čsl. armády 74/36, 787 01 Šumperk
cardFriendsParagraph: Are you looking for an exceptional way of having fun? We create unforgettable memories of time spent together.
cardFriendsFooter: Tip: bring your partner on an unusual date!
cardFamilyContent: Our escape games offer immersive experiences for the whole family. And families are something when it comes to cooperation!
cardTeambuildingContent: We offer teambuilding that you will enjoy. Up to 16 people! Do not hesitate to contact us, we can modify time slots to your preferences.
cardGiftContent: Be original, give an experience! We offer gift vouchers with hand drawn motives.
aboutRoomsContent1: It is an activity, during which a group of people tries to escape from a thematic room. You can expect creative puzzles, hidden rooms, and everlasting ticking of the remaining time. It is like seing a movie, but you are the actors. The themes vary. You can be a hero trying to save the world or a prisoner on the run.
aboutRoomsHeading2: And how to escape an escape room?
aboutRoomsContent2: You don't need a great physique or be a walking encyclopedia to escape an escape room. What helps though, is a keen eye for details, reasoning skills, and most importantly cooperation and communication.
roomsText: Looking for a last minute reservation? Call us at:
roomsPrisonDescription: Will you manage to escape from a prison? Soldier's cell is an experience for a lifetime!
roomsWineryDescription: Experience a profound story in atmospheric Winery. Will you uncover its mysteries?
roomsCatDescription: Our interdimensional portal will take you to a universe, where an innocent experiment went very wrong.

review.title: Review
review.review1: „Very good escape room with different type of puzzle to solve and few surprises. We enjoyed it.“
review.review2: „You need only couple of friends and you can enjoy funny adventure. You do not need to be strong like Superman, or clever like Lex Luthor. It can be rainy day, but you still can have great entertainment :-) This escape room has good background story, logical quests with balanced difficulty. When you get stuck, you may use hint, so you will have chance find next clue and you will not miss your goal. But no clue will steal your experience, you will be in tension, because time is running out...“
review.review3: „Escaping the escape room required us to solve puzzles that required us to work together. We had to engage multiple senses.“
review.review3followUp: from a visit of ÚNSS youth and YALTA, for us it was a great experience in modifying the escape room for visual impairment.
review.review3followUpPart1: from a visit of ÚNSS youth and
review.review3followUpPart3: , for us it was a great experience in modifying the escape room for visual impairment.
